original_text: And five bars for the boards of the other side of the tabernacle, and five bars for the boards of the tabernacle for the sides westward.
korean_text: 성막 저쪽 널판을 위하여 다섯 개요 성막 뒤 곧 서쪽 널판을 위하여 다섯 개며

sentences.original_text: And five bars for the boards
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다섯 개의 막대가 널판들을 위해

sentences.original_text: of the other side of the tabernacle
and five bars for the boards
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다섯 개의 막대가 널판들을 위해

sentences.original_text: of the tabernacle for the sides westward
